author: Mental Outlaw
description:
In this video I discuss the Salt Typhoon hacking campaign which has affected more than 8 US telecom networks and is allowing Chinese hackers to spy on Americans text messages and phone calls. US authorities recommend using encrypted messaging apps to protect yourself until the issue can be resolved.

Read more about SparrowDoor malware
https://www.ncsc.gov.uk/static-assets/documents/malware-analysis-reports/sparrow-door/NCSC-MAR-Sparrow-Door.pdf

My merch is available at
https://based.win/
